title: Boku To Eve No Muikakan
alternative_title: 僕とイヴの六日間 ; My Six Days With Eve ; Six Days of Me and Eve
status: 僕とイヴの六日間 ; My Six Days With Eve ; Six Days of Me and Eve
description:
Description :
        Leopold, a young boy, wakes up from a frightening dream to find himself alone with the maid Eve in a dark, spacious mansion.
He lives his life in the mansion, keeping the mysterious promise he made with Eve, but gradually mysterious events begin to take hold of Leopold.
